mapper.select: select mp.id, so.identity_id as submitterIdentityId, so.node_name as submitterNodeName, co.identity_id as candidateIdentityId, co.node_name as candidateNodeName, mp.type, mp.vote_begin_bn, mp.vote_end_bn, mp.status from mo_proposal mp inner join dc_org so on mp.submitter = so.wallet_address inner join dc_org co on mp.candidate = co.wallet_address

select mp.id, so.identity_id as submitterIdentityId, so.node_name as submitterNodeName, co.identity_id as candidateIdentityId, co.node_name as candidateNodeName, mp.type, mp.vote_begin_bn, mp.vote_end_bn, mp.status, mp.submission_bn, mp.vote_agree_number, mp.authority_number, mp.publicity_id from mo_proposal mp inner join dc_org so on mp.submitter = so.wallet_address inner join dc_org co on mp.candidate = co.wallet_address where mp.id = #{id}
